mapper.insert: insert into vam_board(title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update vam_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from( select /*+INDEX_DESC(vam_board pk_board) */ rownum as rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from vam_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by bno desc) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
